item.description:
All sorts of performances are welcome (~10 minutes max), as well as audience members! Come enjoy a free night of entertainment in a spacious room. There's plenty of parking along the right side of Village Ct, drive all the way up to the circle turnaround or park behind the line of cars!

http://sawyerhill.org/openmic

http://sawyerhill.org/directions ; (use 46 Sawyer Hill Rd for gps directions)
item.how_to_find_us: The beige building across the circle from visitor parking -- come straight in!

group.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage: Mosaic Commons & Camelot Cohousing

item.name: Open Mic Night
